root: ^Hey! I'm David and this is my wife, Sarah
^It's so great to finally meet you!
^I am a Civil Engineer and my wife is a Painter
^We are also expecting our first child!
^It is an exciting time and we want our child to grow up in a home
^We ideally would like an in-ground pool
^Would that be possible in that budget?

Good: ^Also, if its possible we would love to have a home theater
^Additional aspects of our dream home include:
^A location that is close to work , as I would hate a long commute
^We prefer a gated community as well, but understand if that's not possible
^Feel free to contact us at any time!
Bad: ^Are you sure? We did preliminary research and some listings had it
